Reviews.Title: Front and Center Only
Reviews.Author: Kevin Garcia
Reviews.Content: I bought this to to replace one I already had mounted in my conversion van. I was hoping to upgrade to the HDMI connector and a digital tuner. The problem with this tv is viewing angle, HORRIBLE! Unless you are sitting directly in front of this tv don't even bother. Doesn't even come close to the tv I had prior to this one, and that tv was nothing special. This one is even worse!

Reviews.Title: RCA AC/DC 15 inch Portable Television
Reviews.Author: Don't want to set a pen name
Reviews.Content: I had an issue with the first TV, but it was merely a fluke and I am certain that it was delivery guy being rough with the package.I really like this TV immensely and would recommend to anyone. It's lightweight, nice looking, easily portable, has a high quality picture, and the TV's several options can't be beat. It does everything but the dishes. I like that I can use in my car, at home or away from home. It goes anywhere you don't have a TV; like vacation, or visiting someone who does not own a TV.It picks up at least 18 channels with $3.00 rabbit ears, (all local networks and pbs channels come in perfectly, with a few additional channels, I've never heard of, and love) also connects to cable when you have access. It plays DVD's and the picture is great. You have to load the discs backwards, but the ease of use is wonderful and the remote works well with many options.This is a no-brainer purchase. I just couldn't be happier with the picture, the quality of product, and the price. It's actually gone down 30.00 since I purchased; so I am going to purchase another one even though I don't need it!The only thing I would improve on, would be the tone a teeny bit (but certainly not bad at all) and volume level--wish it could be a bit louder when in a noisy area. I can always add speakers or use headphones, so problem solved! The volume and tone is definitely not horrible as is; and really just depends if you're in a noisy area. I even used this at the Airport during a layover. Priceless!I look forward to getting my second one to give as a gift, or keep for myself. If this item does stop working at some point, I will definitely purchase the same exact one, unless it's been upgraded by then.Side note: I do wish RCA sold a carrying case for ease in travel, but I just use a padded large beach bag which fits everything. It comes with a protective piece of plastic on the screen, and I have left it on to protect the screen. You can see the picture just as clearly. This way the screen does not get scratched with all the traveling and taking it in and out of the bag.If others are not happy with this, I am shocked. This is not meant to be a high quality home theater TV, but it's great for camping, driving long distance, for the kitchen or small dorm room/kids room. It's one of the best buys I've made and I make a lot of purchases. Thanks RCA

Reviews.Title: satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: brian boals
Reviews.Content: nice product for a good price just what is was looking for on an updated television  would definitely recommend it to anyone

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: suareznd
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV based on size and known brand.  Good picture quality...terrible sound. Had a 7 year old  tv that I replaced with much better quality. Overall decent.

Reviews.Title: Sound not good
Reviews.Author: Brian Putney
Reviews.Content: Sound is not good. Need to use  full volume to hear it.  Picture is good.  I am a little disappointed.

Reviews.Title: RCA 15.6 CD Player
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Bowman
Reviews.Content: Every thing that it said it was and more . Straight on view is the best.CD player works great , not for Wide view.

Reviews.Title: GREAT FOR RV's
Reviews.Author: Michael Willey "Photog101"
Reviews.Content: I replaced the old CRT in my Truck Camper and it woks well.  It took a little creativity on the swing arm mount, but it works well.  It is also is light enough to remove and place elsewhere with little problems..  The 12volt works well and handles the DVD function.

ProductInfo.Name: RCA DECK15DR 15.6" AC/DC LED TV With DVD Player
